item.title: [Instructor] STA 3024: Introduction to Statistics II
item.author: seanzhengyu1@gmail.com (Yu Zheng)
item.description: Course information: Syllabus Lecture notes: (Credit to Maria Ripol for all the help in building the course structure and materials) week1 week2 week3 Mon & Wed, week3 Fri week4 Mon & Wed, week4 Fri week5 Mon & Wed week6 Fri week7 Mon & Wed, week7 Fri week8 Mon, week8 Fri week9 Mon week10 Mon, week10 Wed, week10 Fri week11 Mon, week11 Wed, week11 Fri week12 Mon, week12 Wed, week12 Fri week13 Mon, week13 Wed, week13 Fri week14 Mon, week14 Wed Exams Exam 1 practice exam, Exam 1 version A Exam 2 practice exam, Exam 2 version A Exam 3 practice exam, Exam 3 version A

item.title: [Undergraduate Teaching Assistant] Mathematical Analysis B2
item.author: seanzhengyu1@gmail.com (Yu Zheng)
item.description: Textbook Click here for the textbook. It is under revision every year. Please refer to the department of Mathematics at USTC for the lastest version. Below are some of the notes for the tutorial sessions: Week1-2 Week3-4 Week5-6 Week7-8 Midterm Review Week9-11 Week13-15 Final Review (part 1) Final Review (part 2) Credit to Yunfan Chang for notes week1-2, week7-8 and week13-15. Credit to Qianwei Xia for notes week5-6. Eexams Midterm exam with solutions

item.title: [Undergraduate Teaching Assistant] Mathematical Analysis B1
item.author: seanzhengyu1@gmail.com (Yu Zheng)
item.description: Textbook Click here for the textbook. It is under revision every year. Please refer to the department of Mathematics at USTC for the lastest version. Below are some of the notes for the tutorial sessions: Week1-2 Week3-4 Week5-6 Week7-8 Week9-10 Week11-12 Week13-14 Week15-16 Credit to Yunfan Chang for notes week5-6, week11-12 and week15-16. Eexams Midterm exam with solutions Final exam with solutions Click here for some of the former exams. They are collected and integrated by Tian Wu.
